channel.title: About the wiki category
channel.description:
cregox knowledge database, the wiki way, constantly changing and improving (until basiux can take over).
- Why should you use this category? What is it for?
Collaborate with cregox school, basically.
- What should topics in this category generally contain?
Summing up whatever is talked on all the other topics, plus what's not there yet but would help building up our body of knowledge towards educating people about technology, science, critical thinking, arts and communication, among other sub related topics.
- Do we need this category? Can we merge with another category, or subcategory?
This should be a summary of cregox. So, not merging and yes it's needed! :)
